District 1
==========

Council Member Suzanne Whatley
------------------------------

Elected to a three-year term serving District One, Suzanne Whatley is a 27-year resident of Sugar Land, a small business owner of 19 years, a commercial property owner in District One, a mother of five, and an avid community leader in Sugar Land. With a business background, sincere interest in community service, and love of governance, she brings unique perspective and experience to City Council representing District One.

As a member of the city council, she currently serves on the Sugar Land Development Corporation (SLDC), Intergovernmental Relations Committee, Finance/Audit Committee, TIRZ No. 3 and the Houston-Galveston Area Council Transportation Policy Committee. Past committee service includes Compensation Committee and Sugar Land 4B Corporation (SL4B).

Her husband of 32 years, Brad also owns a small business in Sugar Land and shares her passion in serving the community.







* Co-Founder/President – Finest and Bravest Foundation of Sugar Land
* Vice President - Fort Bend Regional Council
* Immediate Past President – Citizens Fire Academy Alumni
* Member - Exchange Club Sugar Land
* Member - Sugar Land Rotary
* Member - Fort Bend Chamber of Commerce
* Member – Greater Houston Women’s Chamber of Commerce
* Member - Executive Women in Texas Government
* Commissioner - City of Sugar Land Planning & Zoning - 2018-2021
* Excellence for Non-Profit Leadership - Class of 2014
* Volunteer of the Year – City of Sugar Land Fire 2019





May 2024 – May 2027

* Owner/CEO of Branding Matters! LLC - Est. 2005
